Title: s2CapContains
Description: Determines if a cap contains a S2 point. A cap represents a part of the sphere that has been cut off by a plane. It is defined by a point on a sphere and a radius in degrees.
center — S2 point index corresponding to the cap. UInt64.degrees — Radius of the cap in degrees. Float64.point — S2 point index. UInt64.
1 — If the cap contains the S2 point index. UInt8.0 — If the cap doesn't contain the S2 point index. UInt8.
